articles.author: Jonathan Noble
articles.title: Red Bull will not "force" Verstappen to stay if he wants to leave F1 team - Motorsport.com
articles.description: Red Bull says it will not force Max Verstappen to stay at the Formula 1 team if the triple world champion decides he wants to leave.
articles.content: Verstappen currently has a contract to race with the Milton Keynes-based squad until 2028, but his future has been the subject of intense speculation in recent weeks off the back of the turmoil at th… [+4216 chars]
